alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 9:20PM CDT until May 18 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 919 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Panhandle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 914 PM CDT, trained spotters reported two inch diameter hail 4 miles north northwest of Panhandle. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Panhandle and White Deer. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including large hail, straight line winds and, while not immediately likely, a tornado. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
